title: Project-Based Curriculum for Applying Entrepreneurial Experiential Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of entrepreneurship concepts and less than three years of practical experience
context.additional_context: A process centered on developing and executing startup ideas in real-time collaborative environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate practical problem-solving skills in the entrepreneurial process through three or more real-world projects within six months.
Learners can analyze verbal/non-verbal communication occurring in entrepreneurial settings and refine collaboration strategies.
Learners can propose value creation methods in two entrepreneurial simulations combining digital tools and physical environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
